name: World Tour: Europe
description: World Tour: Europe is an educational game teaching geography. The main game is a map based quiz that exist in six varieties with different subjects: countries, capitals, currencies, major languages, major religions and flags. They all work in the same way with the player being presented with a map and has to either click on the correct country or type in its name for each question given. A game runs until a set number of questions have been asked. Additionally there are paper based word search games and quizzes that can be printed, a tutorial where the player can explore the countries and get info and maps which show various statistics such as topography, temperatures and population density.

shot.caption: Map showing the tiny nations of Europe
